text: jyare bija karmono phensalo kari devamam avase to setana kahese ke allaha'e to tamane sacum vacana apyum hatum ane mem, tamari je vacana apya hatam tenum vacanabhanga karyum, marum tamara para ko'i dabana hatum ja nahim, ham me tamane pokarya ane tame mari vatone mani lidhi, tame mara para aropa na lagavo, parantu pote potane ja dosi mani lo, na hum tamari phariyada sambhali sakum chum ane na to tame mari, hum to manato ja nathi ke tame mane a pahela allahano bhagidara theravata rahya, kharekhara atyacari'o mate du:Khadayi yatana che
